abstract: How to transfer the contact list from an old Palm device to Gmail or Outlook, and different ways to share GarageBand compositions made on an iPad.
snippet: How to transfer the contact list from an old Palm device to Gmail or Outlook, and different ways to share GarageBand compositions made on an iPad.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have an ancient Palm Tungsten E with a contact list that is long and valuable to me. I would like to move it to either Google or Microsoft Outlook; how do I transfer that address list without retyping everything on it?

headline.main: Keeping Contacts From an Old Palm
headline.print_headline: Keeping Contacts From an Old Palm
